label.text: Tharsis lovers, 2 months and 20 days left for NASA HERC 2023!

brand.title: Find out more about the project that will represent Peru in the HERC
brand.p: We are a team of multidisciplinary students from the National Engineering University that will participate in the NASA Human Exploration Rover Challenge 2023 (HERC)

carrousel.title: We are a team of multidisciplinary students from the National Engineering University that will participate in the NASA Human Exploration Rover Challenge 2023 (HERC)

video.title: Our current mission
video.p: This year we are competing worldwide in NASA Human Exploration Rover Challenge (HERC) 2023.

events.title: Our Community
events.p: This year we are competing worldwide in NASA Human Exploration Rover Challenge (HERC) 2023.
events.p_card_1: Join us in what was our first STEM event at the CEP Virgen del Rosario del Naranjal school.
events.p_card_2: Our STEM team is always active and on this second opportunity we visited Colegio Miravalles.
events.p_card_3: Join us in the last event of the month of September of the STEM team that was in the plazuela de las artes.
events.p_card_4: This year, we open internship in Tharsis team in order to prepare the next challenges.
events.p_card_5: In October 2022 the STEM area was preparing various activities for all of you. Join us on our first day of visiting the HUMTEC and MIRAVALLES schools.
